thread.section_title: Super Store 4 Less Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Super Store 4 Less | www.superstore4less.com
thread.title: greg
thread.title_full: Super Store 4 Less reviewed by greg

author: greg
title: greg
text:
The manual was as described and was received on time. It was however not handled carefully when packaged in the padded envelope. Whoever packed it shoved it in so that the cover and 1st page were folded over at an angle and left 2 creases in them. I would have preferred to get a pristine copy. They did give me a refund and are sending me another manual.
KUDOS to them for great customer service!
